name: Revenant
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Revenant is the first decentralized gaming platform on the Metis Andromeda network. Revenant’s platform provides a comprehensive GameFi experience for gamers, game developers, and investors to play, earn, and invest.
